info.author: Zest Software
info.description:
Introduction
============

This product displays alerts in the form of Alerts or Warnings on the top of some or all of your pages in a Plone website.

History of this package
========================

1.0.6 (unreleased)
------------------

- Nothing changed yet.


1.0.5 (2015-01-23)
------------------

- Update notification icon and border with a darker color for nieuwe huisstijl. 
  [f.vandijk]


1.0.4 (2014-09-05)
------------------

- Set the styling of alerts like default plone error.
  [l.huiskes]


1.0.3 (2014-08-21)
------------------

- Change link to alert in the alert viewlet: put "read more" there and put the
  original title of the alert in a a title attribute on the link for
  accessibility.
  [f.vandijk]


1.0.2 (2014-06-11)
------------------

- Improve styling when no image is present, align link to the right.
  [l.huiskes]


1.0.1 (2014-05-26)
------------------

- Fix links to resource images for alerts and notifications.
  [f.vandijk]

1.0 (2014-05-21)
----------------

- Depend on plone.autoform, import form ordering directives from there.
  [f.vandijk]

- Use the paths setting.
  [maurits]


0.9 (2014-05-19)
----------------

- Update translations, translate GS Profile name
  [f.vandijk]

- Removed Contributor from the vmm.alerts: Add alert permission, add this
  permission manually to an 'Alerts' folder.
  [f.vandijk]

- Add a default view for the Alert CT with only title, description and text.
  [f.vandijk]
  
- Add viewlet, basic layout, image scaling.
  [f.vandijk]

- Add basic package for vmm.alerts with custom fields and provide translations
  in Dutch.
  [f.vandijk]
info.name: vmm.alerts
info.html_description:
Introduction

This product displays alerts in the form of Alerts or Warnings on the top of some or all of your pages in a Plone website.

History of this package

1.0.6 (unreleased)

  • Nothing changed yet.

1.0.5 (2015-01-23)

  • Update notification icon and border with a darker color for nieuwe huisstijl. [f.vandijk]

1.0.4 (2014-09-05)

  • Set the styling of alerts like default plone error. [l.huiskes]

1.0.3 (2014-08-21)

  • Change link to alert in the alert viewlet: put “read more” there and put the original title of the alert in a a title attribute on the link for accessibility. [f.vandijk]

1.0.2 (2014-06-11)

  • Improve styling when no image is present, align link to the right. [l.huiskes]

1.0.1 (2014-05-26)

  • Fix links to resource images for alerts and notifications. [f.vandijk]

1.0 (2014-05-21)

  • Depend on plone.autoform, import form ordering directives from there. [f.vandijk]
  • Use the paths setting. [maurits]

0.9 (2014-05-19)

  • Update translations, translate GS Profile name [f.vandijk]
  • Removed Contributor from the vmm.alerts: Add alert permission, add this permission manually to an ‘Alerts’ folder. [f.vandijk]
  • Add a default view for the Alert CT with only title, description and text. [f.vandijk]
  • Add viewlet, basic layout, image scaling. [f.vandijk]
  • Add basic package for vmm.alerts with custom fields and provide translations in Dutch. [f.vandijk]
